thread.title: Halloween Skull Decorations That Are Also Stylish
thread.title_full: Halloween Skull Decorations That Are Also Stylish - Vogue

author: Virginia Van Zanten
title: Halloween Skull Decorations That Are Also Stylish
text: Halloween is the perfect excuse to display the oddities in your collection of objets. And skulls in particular—normally deemed macabre—become almost de rigueur. Here, we have 18 options that run the gamut from strikingly realistic to quite playful, and all are stylish enough that they might just deserve a permanent spot on your coffee table once the trick-or-treating is over. If guests get squeamish, insist it’s a year-round memento mori, or just explain that your Fornasetti R.I.P. candle is just too beautiful to hide away.
